name: Evil Rise: Zombie Resident
description:
Evil Rise : Zombie Resident is a zombie Third Person Shooter survival horror style. This page contains the Windows PC version of Evil Rise : Zombie Resident.

It's an action game featuring:

  • 11 unique levels (around 1.5-2 hours gameplay)
  • Arena mode (endless waves of zombies)
  • Different kind of zombies, and weapons.
  • Cross-platform Multiplayer mode is available. (PC, Mobile)

Windows version do not contains in app purchase.

Windows version is bigger than mobile version, textures are higher resolution and all levels are directly included instead of being downloaded at runtime.

Hardware requirement:

Can run on old GPU and CPU, tested on Windows 10.
